citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
***A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:20pm to
12:42pm on 08/06/2015. Contact was made with the licensee by phone. It was relayed that no one would be
available to accompany the inspector during the inspection process for the day.
